p: As a primary outcome, the time to clinical response was not significantly different between the IFN and control groups (9.7 ± 5.8 versus 8.3 ± 4.9 days, respectively, P = 0.95), which is shown in the Kaplan-Meier plot ( Fig. 2). The log rank test also revealed that there was no statistically significant difference between the groups, considering time to clinical response (hazard ratio [HR], 1.10; 95% CI, 0.64 to 1.87; P = 0.72).
